title: Empowering Global Growth: AI's Role in Public Services and Job Creation
description: The UK's delegation at the AI Impact Summit in New Delhi aims to showcase artificial intelligence's potential to enhance growth, create jobs, and improve public services. The summit, attended by ministers David Lammy and Kanishka Narayan, emphasizes collaboration and equitable distribution of AI benefits for worldwide development.
content: Ahead of the AI Impact Summit in New Delhi, the UK has expressed a strong commitment to using artificial intelligence to foster global growth, unlock job opportunities, and improve public services. The summit, commencing Monday, sees Deputy Prime Min... [746 chars]

title: India Hosts a High-Stakes AI Summit in New Delhi, Drawing 20 Leaders and Top Tech CEOs
description: NEW DELHI (AP) — India is hosting an artificial intelligence summit this week, bringing together heads of state, senior officials and tech executives to New Delhi for a five-day gathering highlighting the growing global importance of the technology.
content:
NEW DELHI (AP) — India is hosting an artificial intelligence summit this week, bringing together heads of state, senior officials and tech executives to New Delhi for a five-day gathering highlighting the growing global importance of the technology.

title: India's Fractal Analytics drops 5% in trading debut, valued at $1.6 billion
description: Shares of India's Fractal Analytics fell about 5% in their trading debut on Monday, after a recent selloff in software services and data analytics firms on fears of artificial intelligence-led disruption.
content:
Feb 16 (Reuters) - Shares of India's Fractal Analytics (FRAL.NS), opens new tab fell about 5% in their trading debut on Monday, after a recent selloff in software services and data analytics firms on fears of artificial intelligence-led disruption.

title: Soha Ali Khan's Plea for Ethical AI: Safeguarding Women's Rights in Digital Era
description: At the India AI Impact Summit 2026, Soha Ali Khan urged for essential ethical safeguards in artificial intelligence to protect women in the digital world. She highlighted how AI offers opportunities for education and entrepreneurship but also poses risks of misuse, emphasizing that ethical AI is a mandatory concern for society.
content: At the forefront of the AI discussion at the India AI Impact Summit 2026, actor and author Soha Ali Khan voiced serious concerns over the threats posed to women by the digital landscape's rapid evolution. Emphasizing the necessity of ethical safeguar... [958 chars]

title: Anthropic president: As AI replaces coders, humanities matter more than ever
description: Artificial intelligence (AI) is becoming better at almost everything humans do. Coders, software engineers, and even SaaS workers are facing the heat. But Anthropic’s President Daniela Amodei believes that people learning humanities may be safer than you think.
content: Artificial Intelligence (AI) has made things quite difficult for almost everyone. We hear news about layoffs impacting thousands of individuals, especially coders and IT workers. AI is getting increasingly better at coding and computer-based tasks, a... [2448 chars]

title: France showcases its Innovation Leadership at the India AI Impact Summit & Expo 2026
description: New Delhi [India], February 16: France is stepping up its strategic partnership with India in the fields of innovation, artificial intelligence and future technologies. The year 2026 marks the official launch of the India-France Year of Innovation by French President Emmanuel Macron and Indian Prime Minister Narendra Modi. This landmark initiative celebrates the deep cooperation between the two nations across AI, deeptech, research, industrial innovation, and the digital economy.

title: UNFPA's Andrea Wojnar warns of AI accountability gap and its impact on trust and the digital economy
description: Speaking on the evolving role of artificial intelligence in society, Wojnar emphasized that while AI presents enormous opportunities, it also reshapes the landscape of risk. 'AI is reshaping risks but possiblities also. AI will influence safety,' she said, underlining the dual nature of rapidly advancing technologies.

title: India hosts AI summit as safety concerns grow
description: A global artificial intelligence summit kicks off in New Delhi on Monday with big issues on the agenda, from job disruption to child safety, but some attendees warn the broad focus could diminish the chance of concrete commitments from world leaders
